meaningMnemonic: You know that 不孝 means "disobedience to parents. So, if you add <kanji>parent</kanji>s to it, it just means the same thing. Just a longer version of the word, basically. This means <vocabulary>lack of filial piety</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>disobedience to parents</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading for 不孝 is the one you learned. Then, add 親's reading (vocab) to it.
